description: Contains the book "Expertise in Axe Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Tooth of Frostfang.

name: Star Chart: Unnamed Soldier
description: Double-click to combine the four charr star charts into the Charr Constellation Chapter.

name: Attuned Ring of Red Death (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Glowing Stone
description: Double-click to crack open the outer shell of this stone.

description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Common Chak Ichor

This mysterious symbol-covered object contains valuable loot.

name: Large Mist Mobility Potion

details.description: Movement Speed in fractals is increased by 5% per stack. Endurance recharge rate in fractals is increased by 10% per stack.

description:
Increases movement speed in the Fractals of the Mists. Grants five stacks of the standard potion.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to concentration.

name: Echo of the Foefire
description: Double-click to combine the Echo of the Foefire, Memory of the Ages, Whisper of Jade Wind, and Tomb of the Primeval Kings Fragment to create the Energy of the Mists.

name: Snowblind Challenge Mote
description:
Complete the Snowblind Challenge in the core tier (scale 21–50)! Beat Shaman Lornarr Dragonseeker with an 80% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.

description: Used to craft Unbound, the precursor to the legendary backpack Ad Infinitum. Extras can be purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy.
